explanation: [0-0] On a football field, one team wears black sportswear and the other wears red sportswear. A player in black sportswear has a football in front of him, with a teammate behind him and a player in red sportswear. A goalkeeper in green stands a little further away to the left.

[0-2] Then the player in black quickly chases the football. The goalkeeper lowers his body forward, ready to intercept. The black player lightly carries the ball past the goalkeeper and gradually approaches the goal. As he gets closer to the goal, the football loses control and rolls off the field. The teammate behind the black player quickly moves forward and kicks the football back with his left foot, preventing it from going out of bounds.
